customer_journey.decision: Books service with first responsive professional providing clear pricing and availability within 72 hours. Same-day availability increases booking rate by 73%. Photo texting for quotes converts 58% higher than phone calls. Clear hourly rates beat project pricing by 34% for trust.
customer_journey.retention: Average customer uses handyman 4.3 times annually once relationship established. Text-based communication for new issues retains 67% better than phone-only. Maintenance reminders for seasonal tasks generate 3.2 additional visits per year. Multi-trade capability keeps 82% from seeking specialists.

Refrigerator magnet business cards stay posted average 3.4 years. Real estate agents become referral sources after quality work.

viral_triggers.angle: DIY Disaster Fridays - weekly series showing real customer DIY attempts gone wrong, the cost to fix, and professional repair process with educational commentary on what went wrong
viral_triggers.why: Schadenfreude is highly shareable, validates viewers who called pros, educates DIYers on limits, positions service as safety net not competitor. Comment section drives engagement with DIY debate.

viral_triggers.angle: The Honey-Do List Challenge - customers submit their longest-standing list items with timestamps, handyman tackles the oldest/most avoided tasks first, documenting customer relief reactions
viral_triggers.why: Relatable pain point creates emotional connection, competitive element (longest avoided task), satisfying resolution format, spouses tag each other creating organic reach, builds trust through transparency
